00019 #ifndef _POSIX_MUTEX_H
00020 #define _POSIX_MUTEX_H
00021 
00022 #include <pthread.h>
00023 #include <asm/xenomai/atomic.h>
00024 
00025 struct cobalt_mutex;
00026 
00027 struct mutex_dat {
00028         xnarch_atomic_t owner;
00029         unsigned long flags;
00030 
00031 #define COBALT_MUTEX_COND_SIGNAL 0x00000001
00032 #define COBALT_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK  0x00000002
00033 };
00034 
00035 union __xeno_mutex {
00036         pthread_mutex_t native_mutex;
00037         struct __shadow_mutex {
00038                 unsigned magic;
00039                 unsigned lockcnt;
00040                 struct cobalt_mutex *mutex;
00041                 union {
00042                         unsigned dat_offset;
00043                         struct mutex_dat *dat;
00044                 };
00045                 struct cobalt_mutexattr attr;
00046         } shadow_mutex;
00047 };
00048 
00049 #define COBALT_MUTEX_MAGIC (0x86860303)
00050 
00051 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00052 
00053 #include "internal.h"
00054 #include "thread.h"
00055 #include "cond.h"
00056 
00057 typedef struct cobalt_mutex {
00058         unsigned magic;
00059         xnsynch_t synchbase;
00060         xnholder_t link;            /* Link in cobalt_mutexq */
00061 
00062 #define link2mutex(laddr) container_of(laddr, cobalt_mutex_t, link)
00063 
00064         xnqueue_t conds;
00065 
00066         pthread_mutexattr_t attr;
00067         cobalt_kqueues_t *owningq;
00068 } cobalt_mutex_t;
00069 
00070 extern pthread_mutexattr_t cobalt_default_mutex_attr;
00071 
00072 /* must be called with nklock locked, interrupts off. */
00073 static inline int cobalt_mutex_acquire_unchecked(xnthread_t *cur,
00074                                                  cobalt_mutex_t *mutex,
00075                                                  int timed,
00076                                                  xnticks_t abs_to)
00077 
00078 {
00079         if (timed)
00080                 xnsynch_acquire(&mutex->synchbase, abs_to, XN_REALTIME);
00081         else
00082                 xnsynch_acquire(&mutex->synchbase, XN_INFINITE, XN_RELATIVE);
00083 
00084         if (unlikely(xnthread_test_info(cur, XNBREAK | XNRMID | XNTIMEO))) {
00085                 if (xnthread_test_info(cur, XNBREAK))
00086                         return -EINTR;
00087                 else if (xnthread_test_info(cur, XNTIMEO))
00088                         return -ETIMEDOUT;
00089                 else /* XNRMID */
00090                         return -EINVAL;
00091         }
00092 
00093         return 0;
00094 }
00095 
00096 static inline int cobalt_mutex_release(xnthread_t *cur, cobalt_mutex_t *mutex)
00097 {
00098         struct mutex_dat *datp;
00099         unsigned long flags;
00100         xnholder_t *holder;
00101         int need_resched;
00102 
00103         if (!cobalt_obj_active(mutex, COBALT_MUTEX_MAGIC, struct cobalt_mutex))
00104                  return -EINVAL;
00105 
00106 #if XENO_DEBUG(POSIX)
00107         if (mutex->owningq != cobalt_kqueues(mutex->attr.pshared))
00108                 return -EPERM;
00109 #endif /* XENO_DEBUG(POSIX) */
00110 
00111         need_resched = 0;
00112         datp = container_of(mutex->synchbase.fastlock, struct mutex_dat, owner);
00113         flags = datp->flags;
00114         if ((flags & COBALT_MUTEX_COND_SIGNAL)) {
00115                 datp->flags = flags & ~COBALT_MUTEX_COND_SIGNAL;
00116                 for (holder = getheadq(&mutex->conds);
00117                      holder; holder = nextq(&mutex->conds, holder)) {
00118                         struct cobalt_cond *cond = mutex_link2cond(holder);
00119                         need_resched |= cobalt_cond_deferred_signals(cond);
00120                 }
00121         }
00122         need_resched |= xnsynch_release(&mutex->synchbase, cur) != NULL;
00123 
00124         return need_resched;
00125 }

00171 #else /* ! __KERNEL__ */
00172 
00173 extern unsigned long xeno_sem_heap[2];
00174 
00175 static inline struct mutex_dat *mutex_get_datp(struct __shadow_mutex *shadow)
00176 {
00177         if (likely(!shadow->attr.pshared))
00178                 return shadow->dat;
00179 
00180         return (struct mutex_dat *)(xeno_sem_heap[1] + shadow->dat_offset);
00181 }
00182 
00183 static inline xnarch_atomic_t *mutex_get_ownerp(struct __shadow_mutex *shadow)
00184 {
00185         return &mutex_get_datp(shadow)->owner;
00186 }
00187 
00188 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */

00190 #endif /* !_POSIX_MUTEX_H */
